stimulusHtml: The thick conducting spherical shell shown above is uncharged. Which of the following would result in the distribution of charges shown?
choicesHtml: Touching the outer surface of the shell with a positively charged conducting rod and then moving the rod far away from the shell
Touching the outer surface of the shell with a negatively charged conducting rod and then moving the rod far away from the shell
A small positively charged sphere is placed at the center of the shell
A small negatively charged sphere is placed at the center of the shell
